name: Exponent of the highest power of 2 dividing the n-th number that is either a square or twice a square.
comment: The first position of k in this sequence, for k >= 0, is A001521(k+1).
link: Amiram Eldar, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..10000
program: (PARI) lista(nn) = apply(x->valuation(x,2), vecsort(concat(vector(sqrtint(nn\1), i, i^2), vector(sqrtint(nn\2), i, 2*i^2)))); \\ _Michel Marcus_, Apr 13 2025
author: _Amiram Eldar_, Apr 13 2025
